name: List
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
ResourceDescriptor
List
description: ResourceDescriptor::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
ResourceDescriptor
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
ResourceDescriptor
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
ResourceDescriptor
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of resource descriptors.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new

resource_descriptors = logging.resource_descriptors
if resource_descriptors.next?
  next_resource_descriptors = resource_descriptors.next
end

methods.name: next
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
ResourceDescriptor
List#next
methods.description: Retrieve the next page of resource descriptors.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new

resource_descriptors = logging.resource_descriptors
if resource_descriptors.next?
  next_resource_descriptors = resource_descriptors.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Google
Cloud
Logging
ResourceDescriptor
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves remaining results by repeatedly invoking #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each result, which is passed as the argument to the block.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method will make repeated API calls until all remaining results are retrieved. (Unlike #each, for example, which merely iterates over the results returned by a single API call.) Use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each resource descriptor by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new
resource_descriptors = logging.resource_descriptors

resource_descriptors.all do |rd|
  puts rd.type
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new
resource_descriptors = logging.resource_descriptors

all_types = resource_descriptors.all.map do |rd|
  rd.type
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/logging"

logging = Google::Cloud::Logging.new
resource_descriptors = logging.resource_descriptors

resource_descriptors.all(request_limit: 10) do |rd|
  puts rd.type
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to
make to load all resource descriptors. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description:
The block for accessing each resource
descriptor.
